title: Prepare Amended U.S. Individual Income Tax Return (1040-X)
description: A taxpayer realizes they forgot to include a deduction on a previously filed return and wants to amend it.

tasks.description: Open the previously filed tax return and identify the information that needs to be changed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the original return and understands the required correction.

tasks.description: Prepare Form 1040-X, showing the original figures, the changes, and the corrected figures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills out the three columns on the 1040-X.

tasks.description: Write a clear explanation of the reason for the amendment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a concise explanation for the change.
